channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.description:
Report E-2023100696

item.title: Report X-2023100169
item.description:
Report X-2023100169

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-31T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-21
  • City: MIDDLETOWN
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: UNLOAD TRAILER WAS OPEN FROM SUNRISE TO FINISH UNLOADING IT PACKAGE WAS FOUND UPSIDE DOWN PACKAGE WAS REMOVE FROM UNLOAD TRAILER BY ADMIN PUT ON A CART WITH CLEANING MATERIALS THEN BROUGHT TO HAZMAT CAGE DescribePack: PACKAGE WAS DROP ON IT'S TOP CAUSING CAPS TO BE INDENTED AND DAMAGED DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PUT IN TO A HAZMAT TOTE WITH BAG

item.title: Report X-2023091053
item.description:
Report X-2023091053

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-14
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The pkg was found wet from the top of the box and place into a red bin. DescribePack: The pkg failed due to the cap coming loose and a small amount leaked into the box. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The pkg was place into a red hazmat bin to prevent further damage.
